dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, hey B, did you catch the news about President Tokayev?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, hey B, did you catch the news about President Tokayev?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, um, yeah, I saw a blurb. He's, like, in Belarus, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, um, yeah, I saw a blurb. He's, like, in Belarus, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev has arrived in Belarus, citing Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! He just arrived in Minsk, according to Akorda.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! He just arrived in Minsk, according to Akorda.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev arrived in Minsk to take part in the meeting of the Supreme Eurasian Economic Council and the Eurasian Economic Forum," the statement reads.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Minsk, okay. What's the [interrupts] big occasion this time?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Minsk, okay. What's the big occasion this time?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, he's there for the Supreme Eurasian Economic Council meeting, and also the Eurasian Economic Forum.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, he's there for the Supreme Eurasian Economic Council meeting, and also the Eurasian Economic Forum.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev arrived in Minsk to take part in the meeting of the Supreme Eurasian Economic Council and the Eurasian Economic Forum," the statement reads.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Ah, another one of those important regional gatherings, then.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ah, another one of those important regional gatherings, then.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, definitely. And actually, he was at a similar meeting, the SEEC, back in, uh, December, too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, definitely. And actually, he was at a similar meeting, the S E E C, back in, uh, December, too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a reminder, in December 2024, Tokayev also participated in a meeting of the Supreme Eurasian Economic Council (SEEC), first in a narrow format and then in an expanded session.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, was that the one where they did the narrow format first, and then the bigger session?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, was that the one where they did the narrow format first, and then the bigger session?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a reminder, in December 2024, Tokayev also participated in a meeting of the Supreme Eurasian Economic Council (SEEC), first in a narrow format and then in an expanded session.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] That's the one! Yeah, first narrow, then expanded.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's the one! Yeah, first narrow, then expanded.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...first in a narrow format and then in an expanded session.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, right. So, what kind of stuff do they even discuss at these things, like, usually?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, right. So, what kind of stuff do they even discuss at these things, like, usually?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, typically it's all about current issues for the Eurasian Economic Union, and, you know, future integration prospects.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, typically it's all about current issues for the Eurasian Economic Union, and, you know, future integration prospects.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The meeting addressed current issues related to the activities of the Eurasian Economic Union and prospects for further integration.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Makes sense. Always pushing for more, um, regional cooperation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes sense. Always pushing for more, um, regional cooperation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Precisely. And this time, too, after the meeting, it says a number of documents were signed.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Precisely. And this time, too, after the meeting, it says a number of documents were signed.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Following the meeting, a number of documents were signed by the heads of the delegations

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so tangible outcomes. Good to know.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so tangible outcomes. Good to know.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Another busy week for regional diplomacy, it seems.
